title: Hebrew Bible (Writings) with Arabic translation
description: Contents: Ruth (ff. 1-5r). Psalms (ff. 5v-95r). Job (ff. 95v-133r). Proverbs (ff. 133v-163). Ecclesiastes (ff. 164-175). Daniel (ff. 176-201r). Song of Songs (ff. 201v-206). Lamentations (ff. 207-213). Esther (ff. 214-226). Ezra-Nehemiah (ff. 227-243). Chronicles up to 2 Chronicles 9:9. The last two without translation. Folio 221r contains an extract from Pirḳe de-rabi Eliʿezer chapter 1 in the margin.
